Vergos cultists were planning to invade Velika using the dragons, to take revenge on the goddess who ordered the death of the dragon lord Vergos.
You tracked down the cultists, and using a mysterious portal the followers left behind, you teleported to Fyrmount.

Using the strange teleportal device, you arrived at Fyrmount.
Clearing the path full of Shurian Summoners, you defeated Elite Dracoloths, and put an end to the Vergos cultists's plan.

I think I can use the device to get back to Wyrmgorge.

I'll go to Elenea and report what happened here, then head to Velika to plead for reinforcements.

Please clear a path for our troops, and take care of those Shurian Summoners. Good luck!

Stop killing my people... please! We were deceived! Akasha sent us here, against our will...
There was a...person who threatened to wipe us all out if we did not guard this path.

They were working with the elite dracoloths... the leaders of the dragon forces.

We have nothing to do with your Goddess.

When your troops arrive, I'll order my people to clear a path.

Most of us are still dealing with the dragons on the other side of the teleportal.

But that Verdas fellow stormed in to Valkyon Headquarters and cried out that Velik was in danger.

At first, he didn't make any sense... but we realized that he knew you, so we couldn't ignore him. I've never seen so many dragons!

Verdas said that you were after the mastermind of this incident... a Black Dragon. Do what you have to do. We'll handle things here.

Gods... , are you alright?
Did you kill all these dragons by yourself?

I guess the Vergos cultists were communicating their orders to the dragons via the Elite Dragons.

Who knows what would have happened if you hadn't slain them all?
